review_details: We stopped off here on our route back. It was all very quiet but a lucky find. The service was excellent.The food was freshly cooked and delicious. What more could you ask for..?

We were extremely lucky to book on this trip. Definitely well worth it! Relaxed and enjoyable trip out. The fishing was enjoyable for all of us and our 2 girls really liked freeing the fish from the nets. Swimming off the back of the boat and smothering ourselves with clay were memorable. The highlights were the delicious food and our amiable hosts! Donâ€™t miss this it is definitely well worth it!
Convenient stop on the way south. Service was excellent- very friendly staff. The food was all very tasty. I had a delicious roast salmon salad.
Stopped here on way through Oban. I had the fish curry which was excellent. My husband had cod and chips- probably the best he had ever had!
